sourcesContent:
import "./about.css"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I work full-time as a software engineer at Meta. In addition, I am pursuing a part-time Master's degree in Computer Science at Georgia Institute of Technology. I graduated from the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and a minor in Applied Statistics in 2020.

Hobbies

You can find me:

  • Reading self-improvement books
  • Swimming in the ocean
  • Hiking
  • Knitting a sweater

Experience

Here are some of my previous roles:

  • Facebook Software Engineering Intern
  • Google Engineering Practicum Intern
  • University of Michigan Instructional Aide Staff Member (EECS 183/280)
  • Director of MHacks

Books

Some of my favorite books are:

  • Atomic Habits by James Clear
  • The Success Principles by Jack Canfield
  • I Will Teach You To Be Rich by Ramit Sethi
  • The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up by Marie Kondo
); }; export default About;
